text:
Pierre Troisgros (3 September 1928 – 23 September 2020) was a French restaurateur.
He was best known for his restaurant Frères Troisgros. Within ten years, it became the most popular restaurant in the region and soon it was one of the best known restaurants in France. In 1965, the restaurant, got its second star, and, in 1968, its third.
On 23 September 2020, Troisgros died at home in Le Coteau near Roanne from a heart attack, aged 92.
